title: Le Divorce
creator_credit: James Ivory, Ismail Merchant, Michael Schiffer, Radar Pictures, Merchant Ivory Productions and Fox Searchlight Pictures
brief_description: A stellar ensemble cast in this romantic drama/comedy about a cultural clash between a French husband, his American wife (Naomi Watts) and her sister (Kate Hudson). From the creative team of Merchant Ivory comes this study of romantic relationships, wealth and culture. Based on the novel by Diane Johnson. Cast includes Glenn Close, Stephen Fry, Leslie Caron and Stockard Channing.
